Packages 
Package Description
simplenlg.aggregation  
simplenlg.features
The features package contains enumerated types that are used for specific features.
simplenlg.format.english
The format package currently contains only a single class, a plain text processor for English.
simplenlg.framework
The framework package contains the base components required for running the SimpleNLG package.
simplenlg.lexicon  
simplenlg.morphology.english
This package contains the necessary classes for running the morphology processor for the English language.
simplenlg.orthography.english
The orthography package currently contains only a single class, the Orthography Processor for English.
simplenlg.phrasespec  
simplenlg.realiser.english  
simplenlg.server  
simplenlg.syntax.english
This package contains the necessary classes for running the syntax processor for the English language.
simplenlg.xmlrealiser  
simplenlg.xmlrealiser.wrapper
